statements: SELECT * FROM biotech_treatments;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_name FROM biotech_treatments WHERE outcome = 'Successful';
SELECT treatment_id, treatment_name, effectiveness_score FROM biotech_treatments ORDER BY effectiveness_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM biotech_treatments WHERE treatment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND treatment_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT outcome FROM biotech_treatments;
SELECT * FROM biotech_treatments WHERE outcome = 'Successful' ORDER BY treatment_date DESC
SELECT patient_id, treatment_name, effectiveness_score FROM biotech_treatments WHERE effectiveness_score > 0.8
SELECT treatment_id, treatment_name, outcome FROM biotech_treatments ORDER BY outcome, treatment_name
SELECT patient_id, treatment_name, treatment_date FROM biotech_treatments WHERE treatment_name LIKE '%cancer%'
SELECT * FROM biotech_treatments WHERE treatment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM patient_outcomes ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, outcome_description FROM patient_outcomes WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT treatment_name, success_rate FROM treatment_stats WHERE success_rate > 0.8;
SELECT treatment_name, outcome_description FROM patient_outcomes INNER JOIN treatment_stats ON patient_outcomes.treatment_name = treatment_stats.treatment_name;
SELECT treatment_name, AVG(success_rate) AS average_success_rate FROM treatment_stats GROUP BY treatment_name;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_name, outcome_description, treatment_date FROM patient_outcomes WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM patient_outcomes WHERE outcome_description LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT treatment_name, AVG(success_rate) AS avg_success_rate FROM treatment_stats GROUP BY treatment_name HAVING AVG(success_rate) > 0.5 ORDER BY avg_success_rate DESC;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_name, outcome_description, treatment_date FROM patient_outcomes WHERE treatment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY patient_id, treatment_date DESC;

SELECT treatment_name, MAX(success_rate) AS max_success_rate, MIN(success_rate) AS min_success_rate FROM treatment_stats GROUP BY treatment_name HAVING max_success_rate > 0.8 OR min_success_rate < 0.2 ORDER BY max_success_rate DESC, min_success_rate ASC;
SELECT * FROM PatientOutcomes
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients
SELECT treatment_name, duration_in_days, cost FROM BiotechTreatments
SELECT patient_id, outcome, effectiveness_score FROM PatientOutcomes WHERE outcome = 'Successful'
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT Patients.patient_name, BiotechTreatments.treatment_name FROM Patients JOIN BiotechTreatments ON Patients.patient_id = BiotechTreatments.treatment_id;
SELECT Patients.patient_name, BiotechTreatments.treatment_name FROM Patients LEFT JOIN BiotechTreatments ON Patients.patient_id = BiotechTreatments.treatment_id ORDER BY Patients.age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, outcome, effectiveness_score FROM PatientOutcomes WHERE outcome LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY effectiveness_score DESC;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, BiotechTreatments.treatment_name, PatientOutcomes.outcome FROM Patients JOIN BiotechTreatments ON Patients.patient_id = BiotechTreatments.treatment_id LEFT JOIN PatientOutcomes ON Patients.patient_id = PatientOutcomes.patient_id ORDER BY BiotechTreatments.duration_in_days ASC;
SELECT * FROM PatientData;
SELECT patient_id, outcome, treatment_date FROM PatientData WHERE outcome='Success';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, location FROM PatientDetails ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT treatment_name, effectiveness_rating FROM TreatmentDetails WHERE effectiveness_rating > 4;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_id, start_date, end_date FROM TreatmentHistory WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PatientData ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM PatientDetails WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT treatment_name, effectiveness_rating FROM TreatmentDetails WHERE effectiveness_rating > 3 ORDER BY treatment_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, start_date, end_date FROM PatientDetails JOIN TreatmentHistory ON PatientDetails.patient_id = TreatmentHistory.patient_id;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM PatientDetails WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, outcome FROM Patients WHERE treatment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Treatments ORDER BY effectiveness_rating DESC;
SELECT doctor_id, doctor_name, specialty FROM Doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT hospital_name, location FROM Hospitals WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, outcome FROM Patients WHERE treatment_id = 1;

SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, effectiveness_rating FROM Patients JOIN Patient_Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Patient_Treatments.patient_id JOIN Treatments ON Patient_Treatments.treatment_id = Treatments.treatment_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC, treatment_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(patient_id), AVG(effectiveness_rating) FROM Patient_Treatments JOIN Treatments ON Patient_Treatments.treatment_id = Treatments.treatment_id;
